remarks: Complex conjugate distributes over multiplication.  Proposition 10-3.4(c) of [Gleason] p. 133.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
recld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
readdd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
cjmuld $p |- ( ph -> ( * ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( * ` A ) x. ( * ` B ) ) ) $.
